channel.title: [317] Dragon Scimitar Problem [317]
channel.description: When I Wield A Dragon Scimitar And Log Out And In It Dissapears Anyone Know How To Fix?

item.title: [317] Dragon Scimitar Problem [317]
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“p00n scape, post:2, topic:304513”]Hey i Know How To Fix that -=p Just Search the D skimmy ID in Client.java untill you Arrive at the Quest Things
Then find something like If Quest is done Wield D skimmy (ID) just remove the ID if the D skimmy and compile rune and ur done but i know i didnt explain this Good. but GL.[/quote]

I Don’t Have Monkey Madness on My quest tab all you require is 60 attack to wear.
my problem is when you log out it dissapears

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Dragon Scimitar Problem [317]

Hey i Know How To Fix that -=p Just Search the D skimmy ID in Client.java untill you Arrive at the Quest Things
Then find something like If Quest is done Wield D skimmy (ID) just remove the ID if the D skimmy and compile rune and ur done but i know i didnt explain this Good. but GL.
